titleStmt.title: The Christian schoole-maister, or A dialogue betweene the maister and the scholler. By G.E. minister of Gods word
titleStmt.author: G. E., minister of Gods word.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho: Creede, and are to be sold by Wil. Barringer, at his shop, neere the great north doore of S. Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
